{{notFoundMessage}} {{resetLinkText}}
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-not-found', templateUrl: './not-found.component.html', styleUrls: ['./not-found.component.css'] }) export class NotFoundComponent implements OnInit{ @Input() visible:boolean=false; @Input() notFoundMessage:string='Nothing Found!'; @Input() resetLinkText:string='Reset'; @Input() resetLinkRoute:string='/'; //above Variable can be used anywhere now becaues of @INPUT() constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { } }
